oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-08-31 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part two of a rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 31, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Dick Reinhart; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (0:30) Lem Hawkins tells a joke / (2:15) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (3:35) Hiram Higsby introduces Dick Reinhart / (3:50) Dick Reinhart performs "Rock Me To Sleep In My Saddle" / (6:16) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (7:40) Ann Bond performs "Hillbilly Gaucho" / (9:16) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (9:43) Lem Hawkins and Hiram Higsby perform "Open Up Them Pearly Gates" / (11:07) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (11:12) Mary Lou and Dick Reinhart perform "I Called And Nobody Answered Me" / (13:02) Closing theme / (14:45) Closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Reinhart, Dick; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Davis, Chuck;
